thread.title: If You’re Obsessed With Being French, This Newsletter Is Superbe
thread.title_full: If You’re Obsessed With Being French, This Newsletter Is Superbe

author: Susannah Edelbaum
title: If You’re Obsessed With Being French, This Newsletter Is Superbe
text: The web isn’t wanting for GoPro–shot parkour videos, but at the end of last summer one featuring a precision-lipsticked, little-black-dress-clad subject jumping over Haussmann-style rooftops went viral. The video was a My Little Paris production, advertising the French media company’s collaboration with designer Claudie Pierlot on... More »
